com.glavsoft.rfb

Interface IRepaintController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IChangeSettingsListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Surface

    public interface IRepaintController
extends IChangeSettingsListener
    Interface for sending repaint event from worker thread to GUI thread
